Entities.Name: NAME
Entities.Definition: Names of individuals mentioned in the record.
Entities.SampleData: Dr. [Rayna De Angelis] reviewed the note.

Entities.Name: PROFESSION
Entities.SampleData: She is a [nurse] working in the ER.

Entities.Name: LOCATION
Entities.Definition: Any geographical or facility location (including hospital, city, room, etc.).

Entities.Name: AGE
Entities.SampleData: The [58-year-old] male presents with chest pain.

Entities.Name: CONTACT
Entities.Definition: Phone, fax, email, URLs, IP addresses, etc.

Entities.Name: ID
Entities.Definition: Identifiers such as SSN, medical record numbers, health plan IDs, etc.

Dataset.Name: 2014 i2b2/UTHealth De-identification Corpus
Dataset.Description: Consists of 1,304 medical records from 296 diabetic patients, with annotations covering expanded i2b2-PHI and HIPAA-PHI categories.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations include standard HIPAA categories and additional PHI types like professions and full dates. Each PHI instance was manually annotated twice and replaced with realistic surrogates. Evaluations were conducted at entity, token, and binary levels. Evaluation scripts are available on GitHub.
